name: Hide & Seek by Chocolapps
description:
Have fun with your child, meeting the many entertaining characters in dozens of different settings. The game features 12 fantasy universes!

Chocolapps apps promote your child's development because they help to improve observation and concentration skills, and give your child a sense of independence.
